errors.error_description: References requirements.txt file that doesn't exist in the repository
Specifies an incompatible version constraint (distutils==1.2.3) that conflicts with Python 3.6+ requirement
correction_candidates: Remove the version specification and use pip install distutils
Change to distutils>=2.0.0 for Python 3.6+ compatibility
Use pip install setuptools which includes distutils
Change to distutils~=3.0 for better compatibility
errors.golden_answer: Remove the version specification and use pip install distutils
